name: Yogurt Cheese With Horseradish And Chives
recipeCategory: easy, quick, condiments, dips and spreads
keywords: chives, drained yogurt, horseradish, parsley, yogurt, low calorie, low-fat

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all of the ingredients in a glass or ceramic bowl until well blended. The dip can be stored in the refrigerator for up to 2 days. Serve with crudites and crackers or smoked fish and grilled bread.
